field.name: redirect_urls
field.label: Redirect URLs
field.description: Enable or disable redirect of Joomla Users component URLs to CB URLs.

field.name: rewrite_urls
field.label: Rewrite URLs
field.description: Enable or disable rewriting of Joomla Users component URLs to CB URLs.

field.name: verify_consent
field.label: Verify Consent
field.description: Enable or disable checking if a user has confirmed consent for all Terms and Conditions fields marked as required and accessible on profile edit. This will not allow them to leave profile edit until consent has been provided or they logout. Note this will apply to all users.

field.name: verify_consent_urls
field.label: Allowed URLs
field.description: Optionally supply URLs to allow access to even if consent is required. Note terms and condition fields using URLs will automatically be added to this list on verify consent.

field.name: url
field.label: URL
field.description: Supply the internal Joomla URL to allow access to. Recommended to use non-SEF beginning with index.php.

field.name: verify_consent_msg
field.label: Consent Required Message
field.description: Optionally supply a message to display to the user if consent is required.

field.name: verify_consent_msg_type
field.label: Message Type
field.description: Select the type of message to display.
